channel.title: Runique should be banned
channel.description:
Today someone on my server reported this to me: [img]http://puu.sh/21jvo[/img]
I see this as a blatant breach of rules. They should be banned. I'm very unhappy about this.
You guys should probly make sure that you don't have any injection vulnerabilities.

item.title: Runique should be banned
item.dc:creator: @Spades Spades
item.description:
@Spades wrote:

As long as the conflicts don’t involve Mopar they won’t don’t do anything. All he was doing was spam advertising. I’ve dealt with this stuff before in the past. I am sure I will deal with it again in the future.

Read full topic
